newsitem.title: USA: Forte sees Q1 loss $0.11 to $0.12 shr. [CORRECTED 22:40 GMT 10/7]
newsitem.headline: Forte sees Q1 loss $0.11 to $0.12 shr. [CORRECTED 22:40 GMT 10/7]

text.p: Forte Software Inc said on Wednesday that its revenues for the first quarter of this year are expected to be in the range of $14.5 million to $15 million, and it expects a loss of $0.11 to $0.12 per share.
Analysts had expected a $0.06 per share loss for this year's first quarter (corrects to show expecting a loss), according to First Call Inc.
The final results for the first quarter are expected to be announced after the close of the market on July 21, the company said.
"Our first quarter performance was principally affected by performance issues within the North American sales organization," a news release issued by the company said.

"We've grown our North American sales force significantly in recent months and it has taken longer than expected to train and assimilate sales reps and managers, realign territories and achieve desired productivity levels," the release said.
